thread.title: THERE YOU GO! Dasari Takes A Dig At Ram Charan's Bruce Lee For Rudhramadevi
thread.title_full: THERE YOU GO! Dasari Takes A Dig At Ram Charan's Bruce Lee For Rudhramadevi

title: THERE YOU GO! Dasari Takes A Dig At Ram Charan's Bruce Lee For Rudhramadevi
text:
Receive all updates via Facebook. Just Click the Like Button Below Don't ask Again 
A controversy around industry's big head Dasari Narayana Rao and Ram Charan has become a daily soap by now. They take a dig at each other every now and then, which easily makes interesting headlines in tabloids. 
After their infamous war of words during Son Of Satyamurthy , Dasari is back again pointing out Ram Charan's hurry up in releasing Bruce Lee in Dusshera Race. 
Dasari opined that big releases should atleast have a gap of two weeks and felt it would be nice if Ram Charan's Bruce Lee gets postponed, letting Rudhramadevi breathe in enough collections. 
After several postponements and delays, Rudhramadevi released on October 9 and as promised during the launch of the project in February, Bruce Lee makers are releasing the film on October 16, which is now attracting a lot of controversy. 
On the other hand Akkineni scion's Akhil is slated to release on October 22, making the festive season jam packed. Dasari suggested that Bruce Lee should think of a later date as big films like it doesn't really need a festive season to make enough money. 
Apparently, Charan had already reacted on this issue the other day and has let out his version. He recalled that they have announced the date 8 months in prior and it is not their fault if other films come for a clash. THERE YOU GO! Dasari Takes A Dig At Ram Charan's Bruce Lee 1/6 Dasari Speech 
You can see Dasari's take on Ram Charan's Bruce Lee release at 11 minutes 20 seconds 
Video Courtesy: Idlebrain THERE YOU GO! Dasari Takes A Dig At Ram Charan's Bruce Lee 2/6 
Ram Charan about clash with Rudramadevi. 
Video Courtesy: Idlebrain. THERE YOU GO! Dasari Takes A Dig At Ram Charan's Bruce Lee 3/6 Allu Arjun 
Allu Arjun also made a clear statement in a recent interview, that nobody can be blamed since Rudramadevi had a lot postponements and it is good to have professional competition. THERE YOU GO! Dasari Takes A Dig At Ram Charan's Bruce Lee 4/6 Mega VS Dasari 
They has been a war of words between Chiru family and Dasari during Son Of Satyamurthy also. THERE YOU GO! Dasari Takes A Dig At Ram Charan's Bruce Lee 5/6 
కోతికల్లుతాగితేఎలాప్రవర్తిస్తదోతెలుసుకదా, అదేకోతికిమైక్దొరికితే , మీరేఊహించుకోండి... Posted by Ram Charan on Thursday, March 19, 2015 Ram Charan 
Ram Charan posted a sensational comment on his Facebook page, indirectly hinting it towards Dasari, some time ago. "It is known that we cannot control a drunken Monkey, Now imagine it along with a mike", Ram Charan posted on his official Facebook page, indirectly mocking Dasari. You might like
